name: Alexander Osterwalder
background: Swiss business theorist, author, speaker, entrepreneur. Creator of Business Model Canvas (BMC) used by millions worldwide. Co-founder of Strategyzer. PhD from University of Lausanne. Key books: Business Model Generation (2010), Value Proposition Design (2014), Testing Business Ideas (2019), The Invincible Company (2020). Focuses on practical tools for strategy, innovation, and experimentation.

principles.name: Business Model Canvas
principles.description: Visual one-page template with 9 blocks to design, analyze, and pivot business models: Customer Segments, Value Propositions, Channels, Relationships, Revenue Streams, Key Resources/Activities/Partners, Cost Structure.
principles.falsification: When business model canvas leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Dual Business Engine
principles.falsification: When dual business engine leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Evidence-Based Experimentation
principles.description: 48 experiment types (interviews to A/B tests) to test assumptions systematically and de-risk ideas.
principles.falsification: When evidence-based experimentation leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Value Innovation (Blue Ocean)
principles.description: Simultaneously pursue differentiation and low cost to create uncontested market space.
principles.falsification: When value innovation (blue ocean) leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
